reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was recently remodeled and was both spacious and pleasant. Mini-fridge was provided, and air conditioning worked well--not always true at *** hotels. Excellent view of ocean with small patio (if ocean-view room is booked). Busy road between hotel and beach (hotel has underground beach access), but excellent soundproofing in room. Staff was courteous and helpful. Excellent breakfast included, but avoid the restaurant otherwise. Other meals at the restaurant were truly bad, a rare occurrence in Spain. Parking is advertised as available at a cost, but the garage was full. We got very lucky with street parking.
reviews.title: Entirely satisifed - except the restaurant.

reviews.text: We (2 rooms, 3 adults also with 1 child and 1 baby) stayed at the hotel for a night on the way to Andorra. We brought with us some bottles of wine and food for children, the hotel staff accommodated our need well. We asked for some knives, forks etc, hot water to make milk for a baby, and when we had problem with opening a bottle of wine, the staff came to our room and patiently (cos something was wrong with the cork) worked her magic with a corkscrew. She even lent us a bucket and gave us ice to chill the wine.
reviews.title: impressive service
